tool_description: A multiple choice quiz game focusing on food with 5 levels and 15 questions each
name: Food Quiz
title: Food Quiz

api_list.name: levels
api_list.description: gets questions from a level (1-5). Level must be specified by user.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://food-quiz.p.rapidapi.com/questions/1"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "food-quiz.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://food-quiz.p.rapidapi.com/questions/{level}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "food-quiz.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: all questions
api_list.description: Gets all 75 questions for all 5 levels
